job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongJob Description strongppOrchestrade is looking for a software engineer with strong technical skills to join our development team The Orchestrade development team continually extends our leading trading risk and operations solution to cover new business cases new financial products new analytics as well as meeting the challenges of the continuous evolution of capital markets for sellside toptier banks and buyside hedge funds and asset managersppbrppstrongJob Site strongpp San Mateo CaliforniappbrppstrongResponsibilities strongpp Contribute to the design of new servicespp Develop software that is highperformance scalable and robustpp Work closely with the Product team to define and understand enduser requirements and translate them into pragmatic technical solutionspp Contribute to and improve our engineering standards tooling and processespp Participate in developing automated tests coverageppbrppstrongMinimum Requirements strongpp BSMS degree in Computer Science or other related fieldspp Ability to solve complex issues and strong analytical skillspp Experience with objectoriented programming languages C is a pluspp Ability to work well with remote teamspp Proficient in Englishpp Positive attitude and mindsetppbrppstrongWhy Choose Orchestrade strongpp Work with latest technologies and worldwide biggest financial institutionspp International teampp Passion to see what is under the hood and master the frameworks usedpp Dedicated time to continuous learningpp Eager to improve your knowledge on financial markets and on the latest technologiesp
